Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What sustainable or environmental practices have been implemented?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
Throughout the provided text, there are several sustainable or environmental practices that have been implemented by Ozeano. These include:

1. Achieving carbon-neutrality by calculating the CO2 emissions generated by their products and accessing them in order to be able to offset their carbon footprint. They work with Green Story to conduct life cycle analysis of their entire supply chains.
2. Partnering with Green Story to undertake rigorous life cycle analysis of their entire supply chains in order to calculate the CO2 emissions generated by their products and access them in order to be able to offset their carbon footprint.
3. Using recyclable, renewable, and biodegradable materials such as plant-based bio-acetate pouches, GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) certified organic cotton cloth, and home-compostable courier bags with biodegradable tape.
4. Sourcing materials from suppliers who adhere to strict environmental and ethical standards.
5. Supporting reforestation, renewable energy, and community projects to offset their carbon footprint.
6. Donating 6% from each purchase of Ozeano sunglasses (excluding wholesale) to fund the operation of 1 Seabin units to remove 6 kg of plastic and marine litter from our oceans and waterways.
7. Being a certified B Corporation, which means they undergo regular assessments to maintain high social and environmental performance standards.
8. Using eco-friendly shipping materials like recycled and recyclable kraft with environmentally-friendly ultraviolet ink for shipping packaging.
9. Prioritizing handmade, built-to-last environmentally-friendly products that stand the test of time without costing the Earth.

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: Are there any events or initiatives focused on environmental conservation? If yet then list 10 such events.
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
Yes, there are numerous events and initiatives focused on environmental conservation. Here are ten examples:

1. World Environment Day (June 5th)
2. Earth Hour (March/April)
3. United Nations Climate Summit (held periodically since 209)
4. COP26 - United Nations Climate Change Conference (to be held in 226)
5. Global Landscapes Forum (held annually since 213)
6. International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) World Conservation Congress (held every four years since 198)
7. World Wildlife Day (March 3rd)
8. Our Ocean Conference (held biennially since 211)
9. Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) COP (Conference of Parties) meetings (held annually since 192)
10. UN Environment Programme (UNEP) World Environmental Education Congress (held quadrennially since 197)

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Has the organization made any public commitments to social or corporate responsibility?
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result:
Yes, the organization has made several public commitments to social and corporate responsibility. They are:

1. Partnering with The Seabin Project to fund the removal of 6 kg of plastic and marine litter from oceans and waterways with every sale of Ozeano sunglasses.
2. Contributing at least 1% of their annual sales to support environmental causes through membership in the '1 for the Planet' organization.
3. Achieving B Corporation certification, demonstrating a commitment to high social and environmental performance, public transparency, and legal accountability.
4. Using only environmentally-friendly materials and employing ethical and sustainable production practices.
5. Investing in offset projects like renewable energy, forest conservation, and energy efficiency to address unavoidable carbon emissions generated during production.
6. Providing customers with certificates for carbon credit purchases, making all products and accessories "carbon neutral" from "seed to shelf."

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Are there annual or quarterly reports detailing these commitments? If yes, then summarize.

They cover topics like carbon footprint reduction, partnerships with eco-conscious organizations, charitable contributions, and progress towards achieving various certifications. By publishing these reports regularly, Ozeano demonstrates their dedication to transparency and accountability in balancing profit and purpose.

Commerce & Products.question: What products, services, or technologies are available?
Commerce & Products.result:
Based on the provided context, there are several products, services, and technologies mentioned. These include:

1. Healthcare products and services (possibly eye care)
2. Online platform for communication and support
3. Live chat functionality
4. Social media integration
5. Email communication tools
6. Website and app development
7. Encryption and secure transmission of data
8. Firewall protection

source.content: access encryption and other industry standard security protocols like use of firewalls and complex password protection We will not use or disclose personal information for any secondary purpose unless that secondary purpose is related to the primary purpose for which we have collected that information and you would reasonably expect the disclosure in the circumstances or unless you consent to that use or disclosure  For the purposes of the GDPR we are a data processor and a data controller  The purposes for which we hold use and disclose and process information include conducting our business which includes providing our services or the services of a third party to you; maintaining the safety and security of our operations eg electronic and other security monitoring maintaining management records; to communicate information about our products and services or third party products or services that may be of interest to you;  for our internal administrative research planning marketing

a person’s health among other things We collect and hold personal information about individuals for the provision of our products and services and purposes connected to those products and services  Consistent with the provision of our products and services the types of personal information we may collect and hold include  Your identity and contact details - includes your name date of birth gender email address home postal address delivery address if different and your contact telephone numbers; Your payment details - your bank details and payment card details  Please note payment transactions are encrypted by the acquiring bank so we will not retain any payment card details submitted by you; Your profile data - if you register a customer account this includes the profile you create to identify yourself when connecting to our website and apps including your username and password and other data about purchases and your personal preferences;  Other information – we may collect insurance

Commerce & Products.question: What are the key partnerships or collaborations related to commerce?
Commerce & Products.result: The key partnership or collaboration related to commerce for Ozeano is their partnership with the Seabin Project. This partnership allows Ozeano to fund the removal of plastic and marine litter from oceans and waterways with every sale of their sunglasses. Additionally, they are members of the '1 for the Planet' organization, which involves contributing at least one percent of their annual sales to support environmental causes.

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What organizations, institutions, or entities is the organization collaborating with?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
The organization is collaborating with the following entities:

1. The Seabin Project - To remove plastic and marine litter from oceans and waterways.
2. One for the Planet - Contribute at least 1% of their annual sales towards environmental causes.
3. B Corp Certification - Achieved certification for meeting high social and environmental performance standards.
4. FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) - Ensure responsible forestry practices through certification.
5. Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) - Guarantee organic textiles are produced sustainably and ethically.

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: Are there any joint events, projects, or initiatives? If yes then list them.
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
Yes, there are several joint events, projects, and initiatives involving Ozeano Sunglasses. Some notable collaborative efforts include:

1. Partnership with The Seabin Project: Ozeano Sunglasses partners with The Seabin Project to help remove plastic and marine litter from oceans and waterways. With every sale of Ozeano sunglasses, the company contributes to the funding of one Seabin to remove 6 kg of plastic and marine litter, equivalent to over 20 plastic bottles. This collaboration highlights Ozeano's commitment to environmental conservation.
2. Membership in '1% For The Planet': As a proud member of '1% For The Planet', Ozeano contributes at least 1% of their annual sales towards supporting various environmental causes. By joining this organization, Ozeano demonstrates their dedication to giving back to the environment and making a positive impact on the world.
3. Achieving B Corp Certification: Ozeano has successfully obtained B Corporation (B-Corp) certification. This certification recognizes companies that prioritize social and environmental performance alongside financial success. By achieving this milestone, Ozeano showcases their commitment to operating responsibly and ethically while still maintaining financial viability.
4. Supporting Promise Mountain Sandy Project: In addition to their own environmental initiatives, Ozeano supports the Promise Mountain Sandy Project. Located in South Australia, this project focuses on preserving local bushland and wetlands, providing essential habitat for native wildlife. Through their support of this project, Ozeano further solidifies their dedication to environmental conservation and biodiversity protection.

source.content: We knew selling environmentally friendly sunglasses alone wasn't enough we had to increase our impact That's why we partner with Australian company the Seabin Project to fund the removal of 6kg of plastic and marine litter equivalent to over  plastic bottles from our oceans and waterways with every sale of Ozeano sunglasses Ozeano is a proud member of the '1 for the planet' organisation meaning we contribute at least one percent of our annual sales each year to supporting environmental causes Ozeano has also achieved B Corporation certification Certified B Corporations or B-Corps are social enterprises verified by B Lab a nonprofit organisation Certified B Corporations are businesses that meet the highest standards of verified social and environmental performance public transparency and legal accountability to balance profit and purpose  Unrivalled in quality and sustainability we don't do fast fashion we do handmade built-to-last environmentally friendly products that stand the test

promise Mount Sandy project is nestled between the Coorong National Park and Lake Albert in South Australia and protects one of the last pockets of bush and wetlands in the region The site features a unique mix of coastal shrublands and saline swamplands that provide strategic habitat for iconic native wildlife such as the short-beaked echidna purple-gaped honeyeater and elegant parrot The purpose of Karadere Wind Power Project is to utilize the wind energy potential of Turkey by reducing dependence on fossil fuels in a clean reliable and sustainable way with utmost respect on social and environmental aspects in the region Hydrologic an award winning Cambodian social enterprise is providing access to clean safe drinking water to more than 1 million Cambodian families by locally produced ceramic water purifiers protecting the environment and reducing emissions by providing a safe alternative to fire or gas boiling methods for water treatment  We hold a gold-standard membership with 1

managed forest is both environmentally and socially All our cases are made from cork sourced from FSC-certified cork oak forests and all our paper products packaging product certificate etc are made from FSC-certified materials  GOTS Global Organic Textile Standard is a certification that ensures the organic status of textiles including environmentally and socially responsible practises across the full supply chain All our organic pouches and cloths are GOTS-certified  PETA People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals is a global not-for-profit association dedicated to establishing and protecting the rights of all animals All of our products are PETA-approved vegan meaning no animals are harmed  ISO International Organisation for Standardisation is an international standard-setting organisation All our suppliers are ISO  certified ensuring they meet customer and regulatory requirements Our frame material is also ISO  which certifies its ultimate biodegradability within  days under

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What are the mutual objectives and outcomes expected from these collaborations?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
In both cases, there are clear mutual objectives and desired outcomes resulting from the collaborations.

In the first case, the collaboration involves supporting the Seabin Project, which works towards creating cleaner oceans with healthier marine life through their innovative "Sea bin" technology. By donating a portion of the proceeds from Ozeano sunglasses sales, Ozeano contributes to the operation of Seabins, helping to remove plastic waste from the oceans and waterways. As a result, this partnership aims to reduce plastic pollution in the world's waters, promoting a healthier marine ecosystem and preserving biodiversity.

The second case describes a joint effort between two companies, Karadere Wind Power Project and Hydrologic, to develop sustainable energy solutions in Turkey. Their objective is to harness the country's wind energy potential while minimizing environmental impacts and fostering local economic development. Through this collaboration, they aim to reduce reliance on fossil fuels, promote clean and renewable energy sources, and contribute to global efforts against climate change. Additionally, the project seeks to improve living conditions for local communities by providing access to clean drinking water using locally produced ceramic water purifiers.

source.content: accountability to balance profit and purpose B Lab performed a very comprehensive and holistic assessment of our organisation with the certification officially awarded to us in Q  Whilst we use only the most environmentally-friendly materials available and employ ethical and sustainable production practices we still generate some carbon emissions CO2 when producing our products To tackle these unavoidable emissions we invest in offset projects such as renewable energy forest conservation and energy efficiency These projects prevent future carbon emissions as well as removing existing CO2 from the atmosphere We buy carbon offset credits from Gold Standard certified projects that are equal to our unavoidable emissions This provides crucial funding for these projects to continue to thrive while making all of our products and accessories carbon neutral from ‘seed to shelf’ When you make a purchase you will receive a certificate in your name for the carbon credits that were purchased to

access encryption and other industry standard security protocols like use of firewalls and complex password protection We will not use or disclose personal information for any secondary purpose unless that secondary purpose is related to the primary purpose for which we have collected that information and you would reasonably expect the disclosure in the circumstances or unless you consent to that use or disclosure  For the purposes of the GDPR we are a data processor and a data controller  The purposes for which we hold use and disclose and process information include conducting our business which includes providing our services or the services of a third party to you; maintaining the safety and security of our operations eg electronic and other security monitoring maintaining management records; to communicate information about our products and services or third party products or services that may be of interest to you;  for our internal administrative research planning marketing
